chunk:
C&Co Facial Toner, Sweet Orange & Rose

Brand: C & Co.

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water & Alcohol*, Rosa Damscena (Rose) Flower Water preserved with Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Glycerin (Vegetable)*, & Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange) Oil* *CERTIFIED ORGANIC

Directions: After cleansin

ions: After cleansing, shake and mist on a cotton round. Sweep over face, neck & chest to remove residual makeup & debris. Please avoid the eyes.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
